body.p: To his Excelyency The Governor of Kentucky

The undersinged petitioner would respectfully represent that he was indicted in the Woodford Circuit Court for dealing Farro in two instances -- at the october term just past he was compeled to be in the city of Louisville by important private business -- being under bond to attend said Court he directed his attorny rather than permit his bond to be forfeited to confess judgement in the two cases -- which was done -- he states that he has paid the Commonwealth attorneys part of the fines and hereby petitions the Governor to remit the ballance -- he states that he is a poor man with a large family and it would be oppressive upon to be compelled to pay the remainder --
We concur in the prayer of the foregoing petition that the fines imposed may be remitted
